name: The Survivor (itch) (Bylom)
description:
The Survivor is a survival game set on a desert island. Try to survive only with the resources the nature has to offer.

GAMEPLAY

You wake up alone in a desert island after a shipwreck, so you need to survive by using only natural resources.

Drink from coconuts, hunt fish, cook, sleep and craft all you need to survive.
Will you be able to escape from this island?

CREDITS

This project was realized for the Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino, A.A. 2020/2021.
Made by Giuseppe Virzì.

REFERENCES

Audioclips: https://www.zapsplat.com/ 
Plugin and assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/
Assets: https://quixel.com/
